context: The only thought that I have for this keyboard is how are the LEDs?
response: This is my second one and the LEDS go out after a few months, a few at a time. I've had this second one for 6 months and there are 8 LEDS that are out.

context: Can i redeem right away one the Xbox One?
response: No you have to download under your account on 360 and after its done downloading (maybe like 5 minutes after) the game should pop up in your queue on xbox one

context: I have the 2005 version but it does not have SPIDER,a  solitaire game..does this version have it.  Thanks
response: Yes, it does, and many, many other variations.

context: Can you play this on the Gameboy Advance sp?
response: hell yeah you can. Thats where I played it.

context: Would this work on my Macintosh?
response: It comes with a standard 3.5 mm 4-conductor TRRS phone connector, and an adaptor cable with a pair (audio and mic) of 3.5 mm stereo (TRS) phone connectors (see: http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/File:IPod_and_iPhone_audio_plugs.JPG). So, if you can plug it to your device, it should work.

context: How quick is the reaction time?
response: Instant, or close enough that it doesn't matter. Never noticed any sort of input delay.

context: this version is censored?? thanks
response: It's not censored,but it's not for kids also. There are a lot of curse words,some nudity,some of the nudity is blured,but you can still make it out. I would recommend this game for 17 years and up. If you like the show,you'll love the game. Hope this helps.

context: Is this a pack of 3 controllers?
response: Nope, just the one ball controller.

context: Does the keyboard blue led so you can see it at night?
response: The Merc Stealth has red, blue, and purple setting for lighted keys.  There is also three brightness settings.  The standard Merc does not have lighted keys.

context: How do these headphones connect to the Xbox360 controller?
response: I have a ps4

context: I can buy the product and send me the cd key by mail and q live in Venezuela and the product It would take months to arrive?
response: Sorry, I do not ship international.Regards,Kelilarc's Shoppe

context: is it a two player game
response: Yes, with two cords, two people can play.

context: may purchase soon, is it online only or can i play single player story mode. don't care for mmorpg games.
response: The main storyline requires you to play with others starting at level 15, and frequently thereafter. There isn't much content currently available for those who only want to solo.

context: can I use the pad with Netflix or Pandora or internet explorer? as if it was a pc keyboard?
response: Yes, I use it on netflix all the time. It works well. The mic broke like 3weeks or so. Didn't last long, but I mainly bought it for the pad.

context: do you get the mad catz or cyborg version? Also, do the keys light up and (if so) are you able to choose the color?
response: I got the mad catz and to this day I regret it. Never was able to get the drivers working even after 2 hours on the phone with their customer service. Yes it's backlit, and I honestly can't recall if you can change the colors.

context: Can you hear your own voice when you speak ? (Like on Turtle Beaches, you can hear yourself through your own headset to allow voice moderation)
response: When I use the headsets ive never heard my own voice once

context: Is there a warranty with this mouse?
response: There is a limited factory warranty.  We are hoping its all it says, and we will have a good life out of it.  time will tell.

context: I want to know if NSA could spy inside my home thanks to the Kinnecht apparatus. Thanks.
response: If you believe the NSA can spy on you through your kinect than you would be foolish not to believe the NSA cannot spy on you through your cell phone or laptop camera. In other words, if you own a smart phone I think a kinect is the least of your worries... Nice try though.

context: Can I play this game Offline?
response: Um I am pretty sure its offline

context: What kind of game is this?  Is it just for kids?  I'm a 37 year-old male?
response: I am 41 and enjoy this game which I had bought for my 10 YO. It is not overly complicated, but still competitive and fun to play.

context: How do you get theThree Guest Passes with seven days of play time that come with this edition?
response: They will be, or should have been, mailed to the address you registered the game to.Possibly the one you ordered the game with, but mine went to the registration email.Good luck.

context: Will this work on Windows 8?
response: Yes this does. It works great.

context: Can you play this with steam?
response: As of the shutdown of Games For Windows LIVE you cant use the LIVE access code to register the game on your steam account. You either have to buy it on steam, or possibly buy a steam code from Amazon. You can still run the game with a steam overlay by adding it to your steam library.

context: Does this video game come with the manual booklet? and also is this the greatest hits version or the standard gold edition version packaging?
response: No it does not come with a manual booklet also its the standard gold edition of resident evil 5 but it has everything but lost in nightmares you have to unlock by reaching chapter 3 but its still a great game

context: Do these headphones put out 5.1 surround?
response: They are stereo headphones. Your sound card probably has something that simulates surround. Mine does. Very good headphones.

context: does it work on steam? and is there the deadzone problem?
response: I have the F310, and it works just fine with steam. As they use the same software it should be fine too. As for deadzone problem, I don't think I had any problems of that nature with any of my logitech gamepads.

context: How loud is this keyboard?
response: Not loud at all.

context: Can this be bought/installed/played on a UK Steam account, want to know before purchace?
response: My guess is Steam is just Steam with no national connection. If you are already downloading from Steam then it should work.

context: is this a 2 players simultaneous game?
response: Yes very fun as well

response: ENGLISH. Voices can be in Japanese or English
